name: LightWalk
description: A 2D Puzzle Platformer about navigating mazes of lasers. The objective of each level is to get to the goal block, and a variety of laser types and gadgets make each challenge unique. Includes a level editor!
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This is the best indie puzzle-platformer in recent years,a must buy for the fans of the genre!
